couldNotLoadDataFromServer: Could not load data from server
couldNotProcess: Could not process one or more files
dragOrClickToUpload: Click here to select files or drag them onto this area
deleteFilesText: The following file(s) or folder(s) will be deleted and you won't be able to undo
couldNotDelete: Could not delete one or more items
noFilesInDirectory: There are no files in the current directory
controlPanelMessage: ZOIA Admin Panel allows you to control your website.
license: Licensed under terms of MIT License
restartMessage: You are going to restart your ZOIA process(es). In case your server is not configured properly, your system may become stopped and you will need access to the console of your server to start ZOIA in a manual mode.
couldNotRestart: Could not restart ZOIA, please check logs
warnRebuildText: You are going to re-build your ZOIA instance. This process may take a long time depending on your server configuration. When finished, the instance will be restarted. Please make sure that you have an access to your system console so you can check logs and restart manually when necessary.
updateInProgress: Update process is already started. Please try to refresh this page to get the current status.
updateGeneralError: Could not initiate the update process. Please try again in a few moments or contact your webmaster for assistance.
processBuildUpdate: Building an update package using Webpack…
processSuccess: Update package has been built. Restarting…
processError: Could not re-build ZOIA. Please check logs and try again.
processRestarting: System has been restarted. Waiting for a startup…
updateStatusGeneralError: Could not get an update status. Please try to refresh this page.
updateRestartGeneralError: Could not initiate the system restart. Please try to refresh this page.
warnUpdateText: You are going to update your ZOIA instance. This process may take a long time depending on your server configuration. When finished, the instance will be restarted. Please make sure that you have an access to your system console so you can check logs and restart manually when necessary.
